Define the task to achieve, including specific requirements, constraints, and success criteria.

Project: It Starts With Us - A volunteer organization platform. Building out the Landing Page

Sections: 
1. Hero section (logo, tagline, join waitlist button)
2. Our Mission section (mission statement + image or graphic)
3. Who We Are section (team intro + photos)
4. Get Involved Section (steps for organizations and CTA to waitlist page)
5. Community partner section (scrolling logos of partners)
6. Footer with social links and contact info

Stack:
- Next.js 14 (App Router)
- Tailwind CSS
- Deployed on Vercel
